data.title: Board Of Directors – Veterans Life Center of North Carolina
data.text:
Garret has twenty years of experience serving a broad range of publicly held clients in the Technology, Media & Entertainment, and Telecommunications (TMT) Industrial Products (IP) and sectors. Garret has served in our Phoenix and Raleigh offices.

Garret is currently the Engagement Partner on Wolfspeed, Inc. NCR Corporation and SAS Institute. Garret is also the Carolinas Emerging Company Services leader.

Garret’s always makes the client his utmost priority and ensures that all deadlines are met well in advance of the due date. His clients feel confident that when they call Garret, he will find the resolution to their issue regardless of the size or complexity of the matter.

Garret has worked with clients in all stages of growth, ranging from venture-backed startup companies to large, multinational public companies. Garret has developed deep accounting and technical knowledge and consistently delivers this knowledge to his clients. His experience with multiple industries and geographies provides him with a broad knowledge base and allows him to serve a variety of clients. Key topics and areas include business combinations, revenue recognition, divestitures, debt offerings and consolidations.

Garret’s experiences include audits, quarterly reviews, public and private financings, including initial and follow-on offerings, and dealing with technical accounting issues and bringing them to resolution.

Garret operates with a global mindset and has developed global acumen by working with PwC engagement teams and client management from around the world. Garret tailors’ discussions to each team depending on what is particularly important in that geography.

In addition to his client responsibilities, Garret is the Emerging Company’s Service Leader for the Carolinas.
